sentences.en: After you instantiate the Validation object you need to add rules to fields.
sentences.cn: 当您实例验证对象需要添加规则领域.

sentences.en: An explicit enclosing instance of class'{ 0 }'is needed to instantiate inner class'{ 1 }'
sentences.cn: 需要类 “ {0}”的显式封闭实例来实例化内部类 “ {1}”

sentences.en: Cannot instantiate an object of type'{ 0 }'from its string representation,'{ 1 }'for the'{ 2 }'property.
sentences.cn: 无法将类型为 “ {0}”,属性“{2}”为 “ {1}”的对象从字符串表示形式实例化.
无法为文件“%2 ” 实例化生成器“%1 ”.

sentences.en: Error object returned when failing to instantiate a template.
sentences.cn: 例示模板失败时,返回的错误对象.

sentences.en: In this case, you can instantiate the class, but you cannot access the internal member.
sentences.cn: 在此例中, 您可以实例化类, 但不能访问内部成员.

sentences.en: This constructor exists for use by the Policy object instantiate new Permission objects.
sentences.cn: 存在该构造函数是因为Policy对象 要用来实例化新的Permission对象.

sentences.en: When you instantiate a delegate, you can associate its instance with any method a compatible signature.
sentences.cn: 当您执行个体化委派时, 可以将其执行个体与任何具有相容签章的方法产生关联.

sentences.en: You cannot instantiate a function based on a function template based on a local type.
sentences.cn: 无法在基于局部类型的函数模板基础上实例化函数.

sentences.en: You cannot instantiate a generic or template class based on a local or unnamed type.
sentences.cn: 无法实例化基于局部类型或未命名类型的泛型或模板类.

sentences.en: You will never instantiate this class directly, but always create an instance of its subclass.
sentences.cn: 永远不要直接实例化这个类，而是创建它的子类的一个实例。
